config-menu.option.junk-highest-price: 低于多少价值的垃圾(鱼)会被丢弃
config-menu.option.auto-attach-bait: 自动装备鱼饵(开启后关于鱼饵的修改才生效)
config-menu.option.auto-attach-tackles: 自动装备钓具(开启后关于钓具的修改才生效)
config-menu.option.prefer-advanced-iridi: 高级铱金鱼竿额外钓具
config-menu.option.add-preserving-enchan: 耐用（50%概率鱼饵和渔具不消耗）
hud-message.auto-disable: 现在已经是 {0} 了，该回家了
hud-message.auto-attach: 自动将 {0} 挂到了 {1} 上
hud-message.auto-attach-spawned: 自动生成了 {0} 到 {1} 上
tooltip.enable-automation-button: Button for toggling automation of this mod
tooltip.catch-treasure-button: Button for toggling catch or ignore treasure in fishing mini-game
tooltip.open-config-menu: Button for quickly open Fishing assistant2 GMCM in-game config menu
tooltip.auto-play-mini-game: Toggle for automatically playing fishing mini-game
tooltip.auto-close-popup: Toggle for automatically closing fish popup
tooltip.action-if-inventory-full: Action to take if inventory is full while looting
tooltip.auto-trash-junk: Toggle for automatically trashing junk items when obtaining new items
tooltip.junk-highest-price: Items priced less than or equal to this are considered junk
tooltip.allow-trash-fish: Toggle for allowing trashing of fish with a sale price corresponding to 'JunkHighestPrice'
tooltip.auto-pause-fishing: Should the mod auto-pause fishing during nighttime
tooltip.warn-count: Number of warnings the mod will give if you continue fishing after reaching 'TimeToPause'
tooltip.auto-eat-food: Toggle to automatically eat food from inventory
tooltip.energy-percent-to-eat: Energy percentage considered low, and finding some food to eat
tooltip.allow-eating-fish: Toggle for allowing the eating of caught fish
tooltip.skip-fishing-mini-game: Toggle to instantly skip fishing mini-game
tooltip.instant-fish-bite: Toggle for instantly making fish bite
tooltip.prefer-fish-amount: Preference for the amount of fish pulled from water
tooltip.always-perfect: Whether to consider every catch as perfect
tooltip.always-max-fish-size: Toggle to always catch fish at maximum size
tooltip.instant-catch-treasure: Instantly catch treasure when it appears
tooltip.treasure-chance: Chance of finding treasure while fishing
tooltip.golden-treasure-chance: Chance of finding golden treasure while fishing
tooltip.display-fish-preview: Toggle for displaying fish info while catching fish
tooltip.show-fish-name: Toggle for showing fish name with fish info
tooltip.show-treasure: Toggle for showing treasure with fish info
tooltip.show-uncaught-fish: Show a preview for all fish species, even those you have never caught
tooltip.show-legendary-fish: Toggle for showing fish info if the current fish is legendary
tooltip.start-with-fishing-rod: Start the game at day 1 with fishing rod
tooltip.auto-attach-bait: Toggle for automatically attaching bait if possible
tooltip.infinite-bait: Make your fishing bait last indefinitely
tooltip.spawn-bait-if-dont-have: Toggle for spawning bait if none is available
tooltip.auto-attach-tackles: Toggle for automatically attaching tackles if possible
tooltip.preferred-tackle: Preference for tackle type in the first slot
tooltip.preferred-adv-iridium-tackle: Preference for tackle type in the second slot of the Adv. iridium rod
tooltip.spawn-tackle-if-dont-have: Toggle for spawning tackle if none are available
tooltip.add-auto-hook-enchantment: Toggle for adding Auto-Hook enchantment to fishing rod
tooltip.add-efficient-enchantment: Toggle for adding Efficient enchantment to fishing rod
tooltip.add-master-enchantment: Toggle for adding Master enchantment to fishing rod
tooltip.add-preserving-enchantment: Toggle for adding Preserving enchantment to fishing rod
tooltip.remove-when-unequipped: Toggle for removing enchantment when fishing rod is unequipped
